subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: The men’s downhill is scheduled for 11:45 a.m. on Feb 13, Day 1 of the Vancouver Games, and represents one of the host nation’s best chances for snapping an inglorious streak.
snippet: The men’s downhill is scheduled for 11:45 a.m. on Feb 13, Day 1 of the Vancouver Games, and represents one of the host nation’s best chances for snapping an inglorious streak.
